t: How Can Brand Owners Gain Control of Their Amazon Listings - One Egg
s: April 7, 2025 - Brand owners can control their Amazon listings and remove unauthorized sellers by enrolling in Brand Registry. This grants priority in content updates, access to A+ content, and tools like Brand Transparency and Project Zero.

t: New company and brand owner
s: September 24, 2024 - I recently bought a company and it's brand. I have have transferred the brand ownership with the USPTO. Last week I finished registering the brand with Amazon Brand Registry. A few years before I bought the company, a customer listed most of the brands products on Amazon.
